messages.message: i must say as someone who hasn't had to rebuild their entire dev environment in several years, the number of steps to onboard to locahost is a lot. Instabase has so many technologies running to get it working :). Not a complaint at all, just funny to be on this side of the fence realizing how tough it is to on-board and how many steps are needed to do this!
is there a homebrew script for our setup or anything like that? or do people have to install everything manually?
GitHub used to use a homebrew thing called boxen; that i think got replaced with this https://github.com/MikeMcQuaid/strap

i think manually right now -- we could probably automate some steps -- would require someone to sit down and take a look at the steps.

It's some combination of going to websites and clicking links -- and then also setting up things like xcode and such on your computer
